summary: "Billy Elliot" is a 2000 British movie about an 11-year-old boy who loves ballet, set during a miners' strike in England. Despite his father's disapproval, Billy pursues his dream. The film stars Jamie Bell and was directed by Stephen Daldry. It was a hit at the Cannes Film Festival and in theaters, making over $100 million. The story was later turned into a book and a popular musical seen in many places around the world.
title: Billy Elliot
